titles: Trade preferr'd before religion and Christ made to give place to Mammon represented in a sermon relating to the plantations : first preached at Westminster-Abbey and afterwards in divers churches in London / by Morgan Godwyn ...
author: Godwyn, Morgan, fl. 1685.
publisher: Printed for B. Took ... and for Isaac Cleave ...,

keywords: Slavery and the church --  Early works to 1800.
